column4: Hello. How do i reconfigure ubuntus xserver when i have a new monitor?
Both monitor have same resolution and are both 20"
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and go with the defaults you should probably be fine
I can't get that to work,, its stops with an error. It says that a tmp diretcory can't be deleted becuse its a file in there. And that the new file won't be made.
